CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.19, drugadditional (100AN)
E2B (R3): G.k.11 Additional Information on Drug (free text) Conformance: Optional Data Type: 2000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should be used to specify any additional information pertinent to the case that is not covered by above sections. This item can also be used to provide additional information concerning the indication for the drug.
CustomField.label: Additional Information on Drug
